text: Addressing a capacity building training program held for Parliamentary Journalists on Saturday (17th June) in Negombo, the Speaker requested the journalists to submit their proposals to establish a strong media center.A fully-fledged media center is expected to be established in the Parliament to facilitate the journalists covering parliamentary sittings, Speaker Karu Jayasuriya said. Addressing a capacity building training program held for Parliamentary Journalists on Saturday (17th June) in Negombo, the Speaker requested the journalists to submit their proposals to establish a strong media center.
title: A fully-fledged media center in Parliament
